biotools.summary:
Sculpting protein views on web pages without coding.

Michelaɴɢʟo is a web app to convert a PyMOL PSE file or PDB file to a easy to implement NGL.js view that can be implemented easily on any site.

Convert PyMOL files, upload PDB files or submit PDB codes and create a webpage to edit, share or implement standalone on your site.

bioschemas.name: MichelaNglo
